name: Cities: Skylines - Plazas & Promenades
description: Say Goodbye to noise and pollution and Hello to pedestrian streets, car-free areas, and modern plazas. It’s time to level up your Cities with this environment-friendly expansion!

name: Cosmo Hunter
description: Cosmo Hunter is a game created by Yuupon in Unity.

name: Evilmun Biennial Holiday Editeon
description: Evilmun - Came out as a very conditional game. Players have been craving new levels and mechanics, We heard you. We have added 15 NEW LEVELS, 5 NEW MECHANICS. This DLC has no conflict with the plot, but only complements it.

name: The Football A
description: Throw the ball to become the best American football player in the world.

name: Pixel drawing block
description: Pixel drawing block is a leisure and nourishing game. In the game, you need to fill in the block according to the prompts of the number to complete the hidden graphic. You need to push the density according to the value, and the results graphic will be obtained after completing the topic.

name: Joey and Penguin's 2 Player Adventure
description: Penguin the penguin has been framed for a crime and Joey the monkey is determined to prove his innocence. In this top-down action adventure, 2 players must toss a water balloon back and forth to knock out foes and collect items as they journey ever closer to the truth.

name: Devoured by Darkness
description: A nerve-wracking walk into the wilds of the unknown.

name: Shooting Waltz
description: Fight with beautiful waltzes with crisp shooting battles, what are you waiting for?

name: Gold Drill
description: Gold Drill is a classic arcade puzzle game where you connect pipes. Clear the stage and enjoy the rewards the girls give you!

name: Corndog
description: "CORNDOG" is a 2d sidescroll runner game with a cute character. While playing, one can experience from a casual Korean style city mood to an inspiring mother nature. Run through four different stages following along a simple story line!

name: Gulu: A Tail's Journey
description: Gulu: A tail's journey, is a 3d-platformer game featuring a cat named Gulu on his journey in the stylized wild nature and villages. Solve puzzles, find the hidden keys to each level, cross the mountains and rivers, and reach the end of this epic story!

name: Murders at Tealwoods Manor
description: You've been invited to a strange party at Lady Tealwoods' new mansion. It's not long until a sudden murder is revealed, and you must piece together who is lying, and who is the murderer as you uncover the secrets of the different strange guests of Tealwoods Manor.

name: Atuel
description:
A surrealist documentary game in which you explore beautiful, dreamlike landscapes inspired by the topography and wildlife of the Atuel River Valley in Argentina.

Perspective is fluid and interconnected as you shapeshift to become different animals and elements that form part of Atuel’s ecosystem.

Real-life interviews about the past, present, and future of the Atuel weave together to form a historic narrative about the intimate relationship between the land and its inhabitants.

name: Oh Sheep!: Baaaa
description: Embark on the fantastic world of Oh Sheep!, a slapstick cartoon-style action game where you'll encounter crazy enemies. Sheep will be your salvation.

name: They Don't Sleep
description: Eat, sleep, and shoot zombies in this survival simulator with roguelite elements. Battle to survive until you die and do it all over again. Level up your skills and keep your child alive as you fight to escape your wintry hell.

name: Twin Cores
description: Defend a Terraforming station against hordes of enemies in this short coop-only rail-shooter! A unique mix of nostalgic arcade elements and modern coop shooter gameplay. Triumph against your foes and compete for the top of the leaderboard!

name: Night At the Gates of Hell
description: From the sick mind behind Bloodwash, Jordan King, comes his latest experiment in terror. Inspired by the Italian zombie flicks from Lucio Fulci and Bruno Mattei, Night of the Gates of Hell promises to be a blood dripping, neon soaked, flesh rotting experience.

name: Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary
description: Entirely rebuilt from the ground up, Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary is the ultimate celebration of the decade-old original, bringing refined visuals, completely redesigned and revised gameplay sections, and a whole new chapter to the award-winning, brain-twisting first-person puzzler.

name: Soulbaby: Remastered
description: An original roguelite experience combining bullet-hell and traditional, turn-based RPG elements. As a newfound hero, endure countless waves of enemies as you shape your identity, increasing performance attributes and learning new skills, on a journey to uncover the mystery of a fading cosmos.

name: Super Alloy Ranger
description: Super Alloy Ranger is a 2D side-scrolling action game. Play as Marksman Kelly or Combat Robot No.2 to challenge different levels within the dangerous Machine Empire and unlock new weapons. Use Kelly’s shooting and No.2’s deathblows to defeat abnormal Machine Bosses!

name: Dr. Kobushi's Labyrinthine Laboratory
description: Guide the adventurous Ayla as she attempts to rescue her doggy sidekick Falafel from the vertiginous confines of Dr. Kobushi's laboratory. Over a hundred pixelated puzzles will have you avoiding killer robots as you engage with memorable characters.

name: You Suck at Parking
description: Drive, drift, and park in You Suck at Parking, the simple and accessible yet challenging game where parking is more important than your driving skills. Collect cars, learn new mechanics, challenge the world, and customize your ride in this ever-evolving parking simulator.

name: Caravan Trade Tycoon
description: Did you ever think how would it be if you were a merchant in the middle ages? You didn't? Well, it would be a fun experience if you ask me. Be ready to be the richest merchant in the Quadia!

name: Food Truck Simulator
description: Renovate, equip and restore the shine of the food truck that belonged to your father. Create recipes, cook the food and serve customers across an entire city. Customize and upgrade your food truck to reach more customers and expand your menu.

name: King of Retail
description: The store is your kingdom! Expand your humble boutique into a thriving business: hire the right staff, decorate your displays, and lure in customers. Even your wildest ideas can turn a profit. Why not start a business that sells only white T-shirts and ketchup? PCs and beans? Your rule, your rules!

name: Magic Alliance
description: Enter the realms of magic and navigate your way through treacherous obstacles and mazes! As your torchlight fades so does your chances of success. Featuring tracks from our album 'Journey Through the Unlight'. Dark brooding atmospheres await!

name: Candidus Caves
description: Sin descripción

name: LocoMotion
description:
Locomotion is an Action, Platformer Game Inspired by many other Games out there. This game has a fascinating story behind it! Play it to find out what secrets the Acidic Waters have in store for you!
You play as a crash test dummy and the people who made you need to test your strength.

name: Isonzo: Veteran Units Pack
description: The ‘Veteran Units’ pack contains battle-worn uniforms from some of the most iconic units seen on the Italian Front, from the Italian Sardinian brigade and Bersaglieri to the Austro-Hungarian Honved. There are five mustaches and four facial items, plus one face for each faction.

name: Isonzo: Reserve Units Pack
description: The ‘Reserve Units’ pack contains rear-line uniforms for each class. The Italian uniforms include the infamous "Carabinieri Reali" police units and their archaic hats, while the Austro-Hungarians get the venerable "Standschützen". The pack comes with four elegant mustaches and four facial items.

name: Death By Hamster
description: Hamster. In a car. Shooting people.

name: Pixtalgia
description: Pixtalgia is a 2D Retro Platformer on the Wax blockchain.

name: Among Us: The Tragedy of Ryohyukan
description: There are imposters among us! Find them. Mark them. Stop them before they kill the entire crew of this spaceship.

name: Where's Mom
description:
Peacefully in the autumn forest lives you, mom and sick sis.
One day you must watch over your sick sister so mom can leave to brew a potion for her. But she never comes back, where's mom?

name: Fallout 76: The Pitt Recruitment Bundle
description: Join the new faction of Responders as they help the members of The Union trapped in The Pitt and unlock bonus in-game digital themed cosmetic and C.A.M.P. items, including the Pittsburgh Neighborhood C.A.M.P. Kit, Fanatic Power Armor Paint, and more!

name: Pop'n Music UniLab
description: The 27th main installment of the Pop'n Music series, featuring a research laboratory theme.

name: Cyberpunk 2077: Edgerunners Update
description: The Edgerunners Update (Patch 1.6) brings various gameplay fixes and improvements, free DLCs, as well as content inspired by Cyberpunk: Edgerunners. The anime will premiere on Netflix on September 13th.

name: Nobody Saves the World + Frozen Hearth Bundle
description:
A bundle including the base game and the Frozen Hearth expansion.

Nobody Saves the World is an action role-playing game played from a top-down perspective. The game can be played solo or in a cooperative multiplayer mode. In the game, the player controls a blank-state character named Nobody, who is equipped with a wand.

name: Terra: A Terraria Demake
description: A demake of Terraria, in PICO-8!

name: Age of Dynasties: Shogun
description: Sin descripción

name: On Earth as in Hell: Woytons Plague
description:
Is a ps1-style horror game set in a small, quiet town.

You are a resident, who works in the city market, and who has to go through dark and scary paths to get to your shift.

But on that day you find something strange, a mark in the back of the supermarket.

Who knows what it might mean?

name: Isonzo: Collector's Edition
description: Ferocious Alpine warfare will test your tactical skills in this authentic WW1 FPS. Battle among the scenic peaks, rugged valleys and idyllic towns of northern Italy. The Great War on the Italian Front is brought to life and elevated to unexpected heights!

name: Fallout 76: The Pitt - Deluxe Edition
description: Fallout 76: The Pitt - Deluxe Edition includes the full game and bonus The Pitt Recruitment Bundle in-game items.

name: WW1 Game Series Bundle
description: Join the Great War on the Western, Italian, and Eastern Fronts with WW1 FPS games Verdun, Isonzo and Tannenberg!

name: Rise of Eros
description: At the dawn of the world, two originary deities were created from humanity's most primal desires: the god Eros and the goddess Aphrodite. With the development of civilization, the flourishing of different desires and drives led to the birth of more and more deities, and eventually erupted in a Great War of the Gods.

name: Fallout 76: The Pitt
description: These expeditions into the Pitt are large-scale repeatable missions for groups of up to 4 players. From Whitespring Refuge in Appalachia, players will power a Vertibird to transport them into the heart of The Pitt. What awaits are randomized, repeatable, end-game missions designed to test the most experienced and prepared groups. Conquer Expeditions to earn Stamps, a new currency exchangeable for powerful and rare Expedition-themed rewards. Unlock new challenges and earn new rewards in the Pitt!

name: Chatseat
description: Chatseat has singleplayer controls as well as chat command controls.Chatseat currently has 16 main levels as well as a level editor with the option to play custom levels.

name: The Button Be Fields
description: Through loss and acquest alike, make these Fields a little more beautiful.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Season 10: Price of Power
description: Price of Power is the name of Season 10 of The Division 2, and it’s available to play today across all platforms for players who own the Warlords of New York expansion or Ubisoft+ subscribers. It kicks off with a new Manhunt for General Peter Anderson, who has stepped in to take leadership of the True Sons in the wake of Antwon Ridgeway’s fall (you can thank Division Agents for that one). Anderson is working with a Black Tusk team to take down The Division, and players will have to go through them to get to him.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Operation Brutal Swarm
description: Operation Brutal Swarm clears the way for our new Singaporean Attacker: Grim. Discover his gadget, the Kawan Hive Launcher: with no reload and a low fire rate, it allows for Intel-Gathering and Area Denial. Stadium will now be a permanent map where you can defy your opponents in ranked matches. This season also brings major balancing updates that will shake things up.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Season Ten: Price of Power
description: The target is General Peter Anderson, a power hungry True Sons leader looking to secure his position in the True Sons as Antwon Ridgeway's successor. This puts him in a position to build an alliance strong enough to take down The Division. General Anderson is looking to mend the relationship between the Black Tusk and the True Sons by brokering a peace in order to martial their combined forces against The Division. Well, we can't have that, now, can we? It is up to us to locate and eliminate the threat that Anderson poses. As you and your fellow Agents take out targets on the trail of General Anderson, you'll earn rewards through the new Season Pass and get the chance to score new cosmetic items during apparel events.

name: Sprint Journey: Nitro
description: Join this Sprint Journey thorough the sprint races in the pimped car with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Slide Girls
description: Be a good boy and enjoy this puzzle game with sexy girls.

name: Enclosure 3-D
description: You are Mike Goodman, joining a mission to investigate mysterious activity at an arctic base. Text-parser mystery adventure game inspired by classics of the genre, using pixel art in 3D.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Lions of the North
description: Europa Universalis IV: Lions of the North adds new mission trees and historical options for a number of Baltic Sea nations. Many of these options include new “branching missions'' which allow greater variety as you explore different alternate histories through the decisions you make.

name: Outatime
description: Those boards don't work on water! Outatime is a futuristic multiplayer hoverboard racing game. Lean-to-move system designed from the ground up for VR. Race against the clock and other hoverboarders in a futuristic setting. Will you claim victory, complete the race, or be out of time...

name: RunBean Galactic
description: Run, jump and roll on your way to the new high score! Sounds easy, right? Not when you try to keep up with the hazards and bonuses that are constantly appearing all around the planet!

name: ParkTo
description: ParkTo is a simple puzzle game that stops the car at its destination. You don't drive a car yourself. The car just moves forward. Use the given triggers to move the car to its destination.

name: Mystical Riddles: Behind Doll's Eyes - Collector's Edition
description: What's hidden in an ordinary toy? Is it possible to bring the dead back to life? Find answers to these questions using your wits, knowledge of the paranormal phenomena, and your special equipment – a magic camera! Are you up for the challenge?

name: Mining Odyssey
description: Come and learn the way of the goblin miner. Take your pickaxe and your grappling gun and challenge the goblin miner exam! A dynamic first-person platformer game that will put your dexterity and perseverance to the test!

name: Cookie Clicker but You Type
description: Cookie Clicker but You Type is an incremental strategy-based typing game. Type words to earn keys, a currency which can be used to buy upgrades to earn keys faster. The addicting nature of progression in this game helps typists enjoy practice.

89 is a simple platforming game that features a small twist, there is only one checkpoint in the whole game, located halfway through the game. It features straightfoward level design, 1-bit pixel art graphics and controls that are simple and intuitive.

name: 2Tinycowboys
description: 2Tinycowboys is an action-packed western-themed arcade multi-scrolling platformer in 2D, with huge variety, in which you take the role of one of 9 different cowboys, each with his/her own play-style. It has up to 4 players split-screen multiplayer available and quirky game-play and characters.

name: Voice of Cards: The Beasts of Burden
description:
Voice of Cards: The Beasts of Burden, is a new standalone turn-based RPG adventure, that brings players to an illustrated world presented through the medium of cards as the third release in the Voice of Cards franchise, now giving players the ability to trap the monsters they defeat in cards to use them as skills in battle.

This truly unique gaming experience brings back the creative minds behind the previous Voice of Cards games, beloved NieR series and Drakengard series, including: Creative Director, YOKO TARO (Drakengard series, NieR series), Music Director, Keiichi Okabe (Drakengard 3, NieR series) and Character Designer, Kimihiko Fujisaka (Drakengard series).

name: Nobody Saves the World: Frozen Hearth
description: The first expansion for Nobody Saves the World introduces new challenges, player forms, and abilities.

name: Freestyle Football R
description: FreestyleFootball is a street hip-hop animation style soccer ACG game created by JCE and published by Hoga. In the game, you will collect and play as different characters in PVP team Competition. The game mode includes 4v4 team competition and club league.

name: In the Darkness
description: Hello there traveller. Are you going into that maze? I must warn you, it's an awfully dreadful place there. Full of monsters and the like. You won't find many torches in there, you'll be in the darkness. But if you insist, go right on ahead. Farewell traveler.

name: Mist Monkey: Wanderer
description: From the mind of award-winning visual artist, Xander Clinthorne, comes a meditative indie-game about wandering and taking it slow. This title takes you deep into a beautiful pixel-art world with flow state inducing gameplay, The Great Monkey's wisdom to discover and a stunning original soundtrack.

name: Alfred Hitchcock: Vertigo - Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: Alfred Hitchcock: Vertigo
- 48-Pages Official Artbook
- Digital Artbook
- Digital Original Soundtrack

name: SCP: Secret Files
description: SCP: Secret Files is a collection of paranormal cases from the SCP Foundation, an organization tasked with containing dangerous anomalies. You join as an assistant researcher for Dr. Raymond Hamm and complete a strenuous induction program that will make you question everything you know.

name: Kamifuda
description: Master the eldritch art of Kamifuda—channeling long dead powers within arcane cards—in this visual novel and deck builder game.

name: Six Braves
description: Strategy RPG game , full of childhood memories!

name: I am Sakuya: Touhou FPS Game
description: Dodge bullets, shoot enemies and even stop time as you navigate through 10 beautiful levels in this perfect blend of bullet hell and FPS. Uncover the origins of Sakuya Izayoi's past and investigate the mansion where the scarlet vampires resides in this Touhou Project Fangame!

name: Trust No Bunny
description:
Everybunny has a secret. Who do you trust to keep the town safe?

Trust No Bunny is a 5-8 player social deduction mission game for fans of Avalon, Town of Salem, Among Us, or Werewolf, actively being developed by new studio Friendly Pixel. It's a game for thinkers, schemers, and downright liars, where guessing the traitor is only half the battle.

name: Isonzo: Deluxe Edition
description: World War One expands to the mountains of the Italian Front - beautiful but deadly in equal measure.

name: Deadwater Saloon
description: Dive into the wild west as a saloon owner in a volatile frontier town. Customize your character and face the consequences of your choices as you forge friendships and enemies of townsfolk, travellers, outlaws and lawmen. Build the most famous saloon in the territory, or be overrun and destroyed.

name: Total Rendition
description: A first-person immersive sim/action role-playing game set in the dark underbelly of the Dutch seaside resort of Noordwijk aan Zee. There is a high degree of interactivity, giving players the opportunity to devise a variety of ingenious solutions to any problem encountered.

name: Lovecraft's Untold Stories 2
description: Lovecraft's Untold Stories 2 is the continuation of the action RPG with rogue-like elements based on the HP Lovecraft Mythos. Brand new dark comic graphic style, an advanced crafting system to create your equipment, 6 playable characters, and, for the first time, an online cooperative mode.

name: Isonzo
description: Ferocious Alpine warfare will test your tactical skills in this authentic WW1 FPS. Battle among the scenic peaks, rugged valleys and idyllic towns of northern Italy. The Great War on the Italian Front is brought to life and elevated to unexpected heights!

name: Synth Retro Vapor Wave
description: Relaxing game, players drive the car to avoid colliding with other vehicles on the road. Support importing local music and car decal pictures. There are currently 10 maps, 5 cars, 20 music, AI co-driver, dynamic raindrop windows, and a large number of custom effect options.

name: Freedom Planet 2
description: The sequel to the 16-bit platformer by GalaxyTrail. Lilac, Carol, and Milla must stop the water dragon Merga from resurrecting the ancient super-weapon Bakunawa. It is the second entry in the Freedom Planet franchise.

name: EvoLife
description: Create and evolve your own digital lifeforms! Watch or interact as your creations adapt and thrive in a world governed by the laws of physics. Download now and start your own evolutionary journey!

name: Running Through a Crypto Mine
description: You are a possum with a large magnet in a crypto mine. You job is to destroy every server you see, while hiding from the crypto security.

name: Gym or Jail?
description: You are just a random guy, but not very random, who wants to lose weight and gain some muscles ... but as you already have guessed things don't go the way expected and you get everything except the muscles. Unfortunately, the situation gets worse and worse. Your decision is very important.

name: Pulse
description: Pulse is a stripped down action-puzzle game made exclusively for Playdate.

name: So Fart Away
description: Linguini is an aspiring food critic with a terrible tummy problem, everytime he eats something spicy he has to fart big time! Help him out solving puzzles, eating all spicy food without farting on others!

name: Extra Case: My Girlfriend's Secrets
description: Your girlfriend seems to be hiding something. Will you respect her privacy or pry into her secrets? Don't worry, though. This is a horror dating sim with a time loop, so you can try again...and again...and again...

name: TinyTan Tamagotchi
description: The TinyTAN Tamagotchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano model. It is based on TinyTAN, animated characters based on BTS and created by Big Hit Entertainment.

name: Glowmonkey2k
description:
This is glowmonkey's origin story.
The year is 1998. A mysterious enemy threatens to end the world by the year 2000.
The enemy is hiding and building an army in multiple servers on the dark web. It mutates and grows stronger as it travels through the internet.
Only the best, and coolest special agent can save the world. Go on an adventure to defeat the enemy and discover its secrets!

name: Yousei Rasutaru-chan to no hibi
description: "Yousei Rasutaru-chan to no hibi" is a Adventure game created by "R Man 44", released in 2022.

name: Shiba Eternity
description: Time to enter the Dogjo! Collect awe-inspiring cards to craft your perfect deck then train with your own unique Shiboshis and take to the world to defeat all of your friends and foes alike!

name: Prison Architect: Free for life
description: It’s time for some improvements, Warden! Make good use of new updates, fixes, and additional content to maximize your prison quality and your guards' performance. This is the Free for life update, and you guessed it: it’s free!

name: Furball Over the Front: 1938
description: Take to the skies over the western front in this fantasy world WW1 casual run and gun style sim-shooter. Fly as a heroic pilot of the Allied Empires as you take on nefarious Soviet forces.

name: Merge Stories
description:
Merge Stories is a unique merge game that combines both Merge mechanics and Alchemy mechanics. This is your Kingdom!
After a cataclysm unmerged everything in your Kingdom, you must regain your godly powers and merging it all back together.
Start your journey to rebuild your Kingdom back to its former glory and beyond.

name: Pretty Bird 5
description: Pretty is a young bird learning to fly. Help Pretty get over different obstacles and most importantly get the highest score you can!

name: Star Trek: Lower Decks
description:
The official Star Trek: Lower Decks idle game!
Finally, after yet another tedious duty roster, the Lower Decks crew of the U.S.S. Cerritos is ready to party at a Zebulon Sisters concert! Tendi's even more excited, as this’ll be her first Chu Chu Dance! But first, they need to get through routine training exercises on the holodeck, which Boimler has been entrusted to organize. Boimler? With power? When has that ever been good?

Impatient to get to the dance, the crew try to end the simulation only to find the Cerritos' computer has been hijacked by rogue AI Badgey. He's locked them in the holodeck and deactivated all safety protocols – so now Boimler, Tendi, Rutherford and Mariner must work through Star Trek stories, both familiar and new, so they can return to the real world. But be careful – if they don’t succeed, they'll die for real. And even worse: they'll miss the party!

name: Living Legends: The Blue Chamber - Collector's Edition
description: When Alex visits his sister at Bird’s Nest Castle, he quickly discovers its curse – all the artwork has come to life!

name: Timewell: Trail of Celestes
description: Timewell: Trail of Celestes is an old-school story-driven 3D space shooter RPG. As A.I. SAT-V, explore exotic planets and fight with Constructs in an ever-deepening plot. Change her skills and adaptations on the fly. May you guide SAT-V to her destiny?

name: Dead Invaders: Modern War 3D
description: Become the last line of defence and save humankind from an alien invasion!

name: Koi hi Kogaruru Kamikakushi
description: Tetsuya Kai sneaks into school at night to pick up a forgotten item and is suddenly attacked by an unidentified monster. In a desperate pinch, he is saved by his classmate Tomomi Soshi.The mystery surrounding the "shikigami" that attacked him and saved him is explored.

name: Don't Hide
description: Trapped in a maze with a beast, you must find five keys and their door to escape. The monster can only smell and hear you, but as long as it hasn't fully caught your scent, you can move freely.

name: WFO World Football Online
description: WFO World Football Online is an online football management game with a non-scripted match engine on a virtual football world continuously developed by AI.

name: Forest Tower Defense
description: Wrrrrrr….The evil spirits are approaching the town again. The locals can no longer feel safe like before. Welcome in this new tower defense game.

name: Chris Isn't Alone
description: Can you convince a demon from another realm to spare your life? Chris Isn't Alone is a visual novel horror/comedy game that gives players freedom to choose their own path towards their fate. This is a student project!

name: Achievements City
description: Build a big Cyber / SCI-FI city broken down into multiple districts to grow the population through simple actions.

name: Idle Vikings Clicker
description: Idle Vikings Clicker is a fun and immersive clicker game. It's easy to learn, but contains many various mechanics, so you could spend hours and hours playing it and trying different tactics.

name: Cake4D
description: The 4D platform game that takes you into the endless fantasy world where your adventure gives you a unique opportunity to understand the 4th dimension in the most natural way just by playing a fun game about two girls in love.

name: Ice Cream Killer
description: Ice-Cream Killer is an old style platform game that will test your skills.

name: Monsterstone: Prelude
description: A 3rd person adventure where you explore, harvest resources and upgrade your tools throughout beautifully handcrafted worlds, where you complete quests and decide which parts of the world get to stay, and those that are cast back into the void.

name: AIdventure
description: AIdventure is a text adventure game with an AI as a story teller. It is shipped with 27 starting scenarios. Unleash your creativity by writing and sharing your own stories with other players. No rules, no censorship, the only limit is your imagination, not someone else's.

name: Zimmer
description: An action roguelike, heavily inspired by games such as nethack.

name: Monomagia Cantabile
description: Sin descripción

name: Celadon
description: A tightly designed, precision platformer with a large variety of mechanics. Jump, dash and teleport your way past spikes to get to the end. Use multiple move sets over seven chapters. For players of all skill levels to enjoy!

name: Kitsune Zero
description:
Run, jump, and stomp on ghostlike creatures from Japanese folklore lurking in the countryside and castles. Collect powerups that make Yumi grow in size, grant fireball abilities, and make her invincible for a short time. Gather the necessary ingredients to break the pact's magic and take down the leader of the samurai clan to end the war.

Defeat a sinister samurai gang to stop the clan’s war of conquest. Hear the cries of the local onmyouji, a wizardly bureaucrat assigned to keep the peace, and end the magical pact the samurai have with vengeful spirits. Only Yumi can break the alliance and restore peace… and maybe get to go on a date for her trouble. Gather the necessary ingredients to stop the dark pact’s magic and the leader of the samurai clan once and for all. But beware, for a damsel, err, dashing gentleman in distress, might need rescuing!

name: Deneb: Across the Stars
description: “Deneb: Across the Stars” is a mouse only, top-down, hardcore-platformer. Astronaut Vega crosses the stars to find her lost colleague Altair and save the dogs. Move carefully. A single mistake can lead to an endless fall.

name: Chunkers
description: Chunkers is a casual, multiplayer first person shooter set in a voxel world where you and your friends are in a world made of cubes where you can build and fight in various game modes!

name: Engine Evolution 2022
description: PvP racing action is back - with more and better content, and with formulas! Enjoy multiplayer racing action more intense than ever before!

name: Homeworld Mobile
description:
Embark upon a galactic journey to settle in an unexplored galaxy in this online space strategy game that will require every bit of your wit. Build ships, establish bases, join a clan, engage in coop or solo strategic battles, and discover uncharted systems in this Homeworld-bound space adventure.

Battle strategy is key to victory. Command your faction’s fleet and immerse yourself in a dynamic, real time space battle. Take control of spaceship carriers, interceptors, and destroyers to outmaneuver opponents in exciting sci-fi gameplay. Employ strategic battle tactics to gain the upper hand and command your space team to victory.

name: Roadwarden
description: Roadwarden is an illustrated text-based RPG that uses isometric pixel art and combines mechanics borrowed from RPGs, Visual Novels, adventure games and interactive fiction.

name: Classic64
description: Sin descripción

name: Portal: Bagley
description: Portal: Bagley is a fan-made, free modification for Portal 2 which plays in an unknown time period. Portal: Bagley tells a new story using new characters including the test subject, you!

name: Idle Space Force: Retro Clicker
description: Idle Space Force:Retro Clicker A retro idle adventure that plays like a top down shooter! Join the Idle Space Force and take a journey through space to unique 8 bit worlds as you collect enough loot to make your way back home, upgrade your ship, and discover hidden treasure along the way!

name: 3 Billion Dreams for a Forgiveness Machine
description: A featureless doll is locked in an apartment, and must write stories that will always be rejected, and must eat feces out of instant-noodle containers despite having no mouth, all for the Forgiveness Machine.

name: Penrose
description: A Game Boy/flash era-style horror game about memory, identity, and finding your way out.

name: Sprint Journey
description: Join this Sprint Journey thorough the sprint racing in the car. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: The Mono-Yellow Madness
description: The Mono-Yellow Madness is a survival horror game taking place in the backrooms. Will you survive in this multi-level trap? Will you put an end to this? Only you can uncover the mysteries.

name: Holiday Jigsaw Christmas 3
description: 500 high-quality photos! 500 ideas for a happy family holiday in Holiday Jigsaw Christmas 3!

name: PocketShooting
description: A simple omni-directional shooting game.

name: Pip 3
description: Pip 3 is a cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

name: Punch Fit
description: Punch Fit is the answer to your exercise needs. Follow the example and punch and dodge for an easy and fun workout. Learn various combinations of punches, dodges, and rushes to make your play more exhilarating and pleasant.

name: My Little Pony: Super Luna Game DX
description: My Little Pony: Super Luna Game DX is a Super Mario World rom hack made for the 2022 Pony Dev Jam on the MLP Forums. The game is based on the Luna Game creepypasta series of games and heavily features the character Princess Luna.

name: Elise
description: Elise is a Yume Nikki-like romhack in which you play as Elise, a fresh young adult who, in her despair, wished she could stay eternally asleep. This wish was granted to her and she is now wandering her own subconscious dreamworld. It is up to you to find all the dream drops, discover the story behind her predicament, and wake herself up from her slumber.

name: Race of Life
description: Race of Life is a college/street racing Adult Visual Novel. Take a peek into the underground racing scene, where suck, squeeze, bang, blow is about more than just your engine cycle. Race and upgrade your car to take control over your future. The more rubber you burn, the more money you earn.

name: Diamonds on the forest

name: Project: Summer Ice - Bowling: Online

name: The Dark World
description: Mario falls into a new parallel world, with familiar and unfamiliar friends.

name: Pretty Bird 4
description: Pretty is a young bird learning to fly. Help Pretty get over different obstacles and most importantly get the highest score you can!

name: The Chicken Quiz
description: Do you want to learn some amazing facts about the Chickens? We have the right game for you The Chicken Quiz.

name: Nik and Kit's Math Quiz: Breakthrough Gaming Activity Center
description: Play all 30 levels answering simple math questions. Each level gives you three chances to get correct answer. If you mess up, you must start over.

name: Rogue with the Dead

The Deluxe Edition includes:
- The game

name: Sex with Teachers

As to celebrate her favorite day of the year, Cirno Fumo has locked you in some kind of minimalistic building. She's also hunting you down.

You have to collect 9 power to stop her, because that will stop her.
There's also lockers. Lockers are fun.

Can you complete the game without failing to win the game, or will you fail and lose the game?

Small rubber ducks calmly swim in the pool and you can watch them to relaxing music. What can go wrong?
Watch Your Plastic Duck is an idle game where you just relax and watch the ducks in the pool.

name: I'm the Master of 3 Cute Maids

As thanks, he offers you a ridiculous reward—a gigantic mansion with three maids ready to serve you! However, in order to become the ‘true owner,’ you must prove yourself worthy within a month’s time. You quickly accept the challenge... How hard could it be to own a mansion?

name: The Button Be Unexpected
description: Bring out even more wonderful things now! Just figure out how they come and at what cost...

name: The End is Nahual: If I May Say So
description: A surreal puzzle game, where everything that we put into the game is possible. Push yourself through puzzles, fights, dialogue boxes, and an inventory. Use your will, wits, and English reading ability, You can do it!

name: Castle Walker
description: Castle Walker is a retro-style classical action platformer, where you play as a young mage who must fight with hordes of monsters and defeat the ancient evil. Fight bosses, gain new abilities and defeat ancient evil.

name: NBA 2K23: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Rise to the occasion and realize your full potential in NBA 2K23. Prove yourself against the best players in the world and showcase your talent in MyCareer or The W. Pair today's All-Stars with timeless legends in MyTeam Build a dynasty of your own as a GM, or lead the league in a new direction as the Commissioner in MyNBA. Take on NBA or WNBA teams in Play Now and experience true-to-life gameplay. How will you Answer The Call?

name: Arise + What Lies in the Multiverse Bundle
description: Some games just tug on those heart strings. We’ve packaged two stories that touch on what lies in the past and what lies ahead. Join these characters as one tries to fix a world he's broken, while the other relives a past world to remember what once was.

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Premium Edition
description: Test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck! Your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve to as many customers as possible.

name: Beaver Fun
description: Beaver Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Scuff(ed)
description: Choose from 4 different classes and various passive combinations to fight it out and compete for glory! Super Casual Ultimate Fight Fest (Extra Deluxe) is a free to play up-to-6-players online arena brawler that pits you and 5 other players in rapid 6-rounds games!

name: The Longest Walk
description: The Longest Walk is a deeply personal biographical documentary walking simulator game about my father's experience of living with depression and suicidal thoughts.

name: Step Journey
description: Unusual turn-based RPG, combining Hack and SlashWith each level, monsters become more difficult and unusual, new weapons and armor appear.Locations are created using procedural generation, each map will be unique, but no less beautiful and interesting.

name: HimeYoku: A Sacrifice of Lust and Grace
description: Hell-bent on vengeance, Caldo single-handedly topples the royal throne of Solide, capturing the king and the princess and working their ruin through his dark contracts with demons. A visual novel about hate and revenge... and possibly redemption.

name: Where's the Bathroom!?!
description: This is a comedic/run and gun game where your overall objective is to find the bathroom, you will battle many different types of enemies on various unique levels! Grab and gun and go have some fun!

name: Flerp
description: Fend off hordes of enemies in this arcade tower defense roguelite with autobattler elements. Build up a team of powerful synergies and become unstoppable.

name: An Opportunity
description: So you know that one rover that landed on Mars? Yeah this isn't that.

name: ClearIt 13
description: "ClearIt 13" is a large and bright game that includes over 220 multiple levels of various complexity with Match3 gameplay.

name: Better Off Dead: Life as a Prison Guard
description: Story driven first-person comedy-thriller where you are tasked with guarding a small prison for 7 days.

name: Horizon Chase 2
description: Horizon Chase 2 is a classic fast-paced and accessible arcade racing game with a unique art style, thrilling soundtrack, and online multiplayer for all game modes.

name: Belt Colony
description:
The year is 2040. You, an ex-sergeant, have signed a contract with a large mining corporation in the Belt. Mine ore, build out your outpost, travel to nearby asteroids and collaborate with other belters.

Operate a mining outpost on an asteroid. Mine valuable ore from large and small rocks on the surface. Sell the ore to earn credits (the currency in the Belt in the future). Build out your mining outpost with a landing pad, drone pad, storage, solar panels, refineries, and more.

There are lots of large and small rocks on the surface that can easily be mined for ore.

You can sell the ore that you mine using the management user interface in the outpost. Just click the "sell ore" button, and you will sell ore at the current market price and earn credits. You can use the credits to buy upgrades, equipment, buildings, repairs, food, water, etc.

When you have earned enough credits from selling ore, you will be able to buy a spaceship. You can now mine ore more efficiently and travel to other asteroids.

As you venture out into the Belt, you will meet others. You can earn credits by doing tasks for others.

There are several space stations scattered throughout the Belt. Most of them are owned by United Space Corporation and Utopia Arura Corporation.

Drones are very useful for hauling ore and small equipment.

Extractors are specialized drilling and extraction rigs that can be used to extract different types of ore beneath the surface of the asteroid.

Enjoy several hours of gameplay in solitude in the Asteroid Belt, mining for ore, operating your outpost, flying your spaceship, floating in micro-gravity, etc. This may be a good game for you if you like space games and are tired of action-packed shooting games.

Scattered in an orbit around the sun, just beyond the orbit of Mars, are bits and pieces of rock left over from the dawn of the solar system. The asteroid belt has countless small asteroids, and between 700,000 and 1.7 million asteroids with a diameter of 1 km or more. The game is set somewhere in the Belt where there are several large asteroids in the proximity of each other. We have made many large high-quality asteroids of several kilometers (and several miles) in diameter. You can land on the surface of any of these asteroids and mine them. We have put quite a bit of effort into making the asteroids realistic.

name: Fall Minamo
description:
This game is about you, Minamo-chan, being swept away by a waterfall.

The object of the game is to survive as long as possible, avoiding the attacks of the ferocious creatures that live in the waterfall.The longer you survive, the better your score, and you can enjoy a cute multi-ending based on your score.

name: Panda Legend
description: The era of cold weapons, the Panda Kingdom was suffered by combine attack because other animals wanted to capture this rich place. Now， you are a desperate frontier general and you decide to set out alone to fight for the low morale of the army.

name: Hot Milf 8
description: "Hot Mom 8" is not just a game, but a whole art.

name: Asian Truck Simulator
description: Welcome to the heavy artillery of truck drivers in this simulation game of Asian Truck Simulator

name: Coloring Pixels: Flag 2 Pack

name: NBA 2K23: Michael Jordan Edition
description: Rise to the occasion in NBA 2K23. Showcase your talent in MyCareer. Pair All-Stars with timeless legends in MyTeam. Build your own dynasty in MyGM, or guide the NBA in a new direction with MyLeague. Take on NBA or WNBA teams in "Play Now" and feel true-to-life gameplay.

name: Skeletons
description: Regurgitated back into a cursed and dying world, you must fight and explore to ascend the tower. But be warned, time and life isn't on your side.

name: Outnumbered
description: Outnumbered is a mass-enemy top-down shooter with rogue-lite elements. You may be greatly outnumbered, but not outpowered. Evolve into the ultimate weapon of destruction!

name: Betrayal At Club Low
description: Tonight you're on a rescue mission, infiltrating a nightclub that was once a coffin factory. Will you succeed? Will you fail? Or will your night take an unexpected detour? Roll the Pizza Dice and find out!

name: Demolition Race
description: Rally style racing with a choice of different cars and tracks. Overtake or push the racers out of the way for victory and advancing! Destruction, collisions, road dust and rock music will accompany you!

name: Grocket
description: Grocket is a minimalist, precision-based adventure and puzzle game. To survive in space, you not only have to escape numerous dangers, but also prove your skills at playing with and against other players.

name: Wilderplace
description: Wilderplace is a puzzle-adventure game set within the Divine Garden, an idyllic creation of the gods that has plunged into chaos and conflict. You play as a shaman, tasked with restoring order through your magical abilities. Explore the maze-like environment, harness magical artifacts, and uncover mysteries as you wrangle restless spirits and evade dangerous intruders.

name: No Fair Play
description:
No Fair Play is a multiplayer soccer anti-game based on physics with parkour gameplay.

An anti-game :
No Fair Play is a "Free Fight Football" game where you can beat your opponents using a nonstandard way. A member of the opposing team has a good dribbling skills ? Aim for the legs !
Punch, push, tackle, grab ... it's up to you to choose how you get the upper hand on your opponent.

Based on physics :
Ragdolls, ball control, player interactions … physics gives players more opportunities to have fun with unexpected situations.

name: Socialism Simulator
description: The civil war is over. To the rapturous cheers of the crowd, you and four of your companions take control of the country. The young socialist state proudly raises its flags, its eyes fixed on a distant, bright future.

name: Splatoon 3
description: Enter the Splatlands, a sun-scorched desert inhabited by battle-hardened Inklings and Octolings. Splatsville, the city of chaos, is the adrenaline-fueled heart of this dusty wasteland. Even in this desolate environment, Turf War reigns supreme and battles rage in new stages located in the surrounding wilds. Dynamic new moves help these fighters dodge attacks and cover more ground, along with a new bow-shaped weapon to sling ink.

name: Broken Pieces
description: Broken Pieces is a psychological thriller taking place in a french coastal village somehow outside the flow of time. Solve the mysteries by putting the pieces of the story back together by figuring out the enigma behind this mystical place.

name: One Dreamer
description: Help Frank, a burnt out indie game developer, rediscover his love for video games while struggling to release his debut title. Reprogram objects, fix bugs and solve coding puzzles as you journey through the story of One Dreamer.

name: Taiji
description: Explore a mysterious and detailed world full of puzzles. It is important to think hard and to pay close attention, as vital clues are sometimes hidden in plain sight.

name: Doko Roko
description: Doko Roko is a game by Eric Mack that was successfully crowd-funded in November 2015. It is being developed by Okobu Games with a planned release in Q4 2017.

name: Yass or Pass
description: "You're a totally voluntary and in no way kidnapped contestant on the hottest speed dating game show in this reality!"

name: Bubbly Letters
description: An arcade puzzle word-building game for the Playdate.

name: You're Cookin', Good Lookin'!
description:
You're Cookin', Good Lookin' is a 2D fighting game!

This game was created for Yuri Jam 2022. Mio and Beatriz are a married couple who, despite both being professionals in the cullinary industry, are fighting to decide who's cooking dinner tonight!

name: Azazel's Second Descent
description: Azazel's Second Descent is a full, 32 map megawad. This is a one-man megawad and all maps were made by me. I would categorize the maps as slaughter-lite, meaning it is not full-on slaughter but you might face a horde or two, especially the farther into the wad you go. The WAD is broken down into six 5-map episodes. There are 4 new monster types and 2 bosses added.

name: Alien Invasion: RPG Idle Space
description: Do you like survival rpg adventure games or maybe role playing fun idle games? Our app Alien Invasion: RPG Idle Space is a cool mix of different genres. If you are bored at work or at home - just download our surviving alien game and enjoy amazing gameplay. Feel like an alien, discover evolution and destroy all humans!

name: The Quest For Milk 64
description: Sin descripción

name: I Commissioned Some Bees 6
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 10 art pieces to choose from, and 1000+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Steelrising: Marie-Antoinette Cosmetic Pack
description: Dress up in your best attire with the Marie-Antoinette pack. The Marie-Antoinette pack includes a complete outfit for Aegis with hat, jacket, boots and trousers.

name: Stars of the Screen
description:
A game of relaxation and [redacted].

This is totally just a collection of screensavers for Playdate. Yup, nothing weird or special. There’s no game in it. Also, screensavers would be very useful on a device with a cathode-ray tube monitor. Or perhaps some OLED screen. That’s not what Playdate is. However, you can still chill with the screensavers. And loading. Oh my, there’s a lot of loading and you won’t be standing idly by.

Includes:
Additional Scenario Missions

EX Mission Extreme 1

Additional Playable Units

name: Pretty Bird 3
description: Pretty is a young bird learning to fly. Help Pretty get over different obstacles and most importantly get the highest score you can!

name: Turn-Based Strategy Bundle
description: Including four turn-based strategy games published by Goblinz!

name: Iron Marines Invasion
description: Iron Marines Invasion will give you hours of colorful, fun gameplay in this epic real-time strategy space odyssey, available to play offline.

name: Arcade Archives: Champion Wrestler
description: Champion Wrestler is an action game released by Taito in 1989. Become a professional wrestler, intent on making obtaining fame and fortune on their way to becoming the champion! Choose a wrestler from the 8 available and utilize their own unique stats …

name: QUByte Classics: Radical Rex
description:
Radical Rex is a classic adventure platformer game that brings a fire-breathing Tyrannosaurus on a skateboard that has to save his race from the spell of an evil creature.

Rex can ride his skateboard, breath fire and kick the enemies to defeat them, jump, swing on vines and roar to shake everything! He will slam through ten wild levels, like jungles, freaked-out forests, haunted dino-graveyards, piranha-infested underwater caves and even inside a giant dinosaur!

No sweet for Rex - because he's too Radical to be extinct!

name: Garden Simulator
description: Plant, design, harvest. With Garden Simulator you'll get your own allotment, place deco elements and cultivate plants to harvest and sell them. Get ready for a beautiful time in nature. Always remember: A garden is a delight to the eye and a solace for the soul.

name: This Girl Does Not Exist
description: This Girl Does Not Exist is the first game of its kind. It is a game full of beautiful girls .. all of whom have been generated by a creative AI! Dive into this vibrant colorful puzzle game and discover unique personality of each girl as you unlock their beautiful pictures.

name: Mythic: Frost Trials
description: Mythic Frost Trials is a free, cross-platform, massively multiplayer party game where you and your fellow wanderers compete in the Frost Trials for a coveted spot on the global leaderboard. Will you secure the fate of the realm? Will you become Mythic?

name: Pandaty
description: Pandaty is 2D Cute Platformer Game, Explore this sweet world of adventure! Our character must pass the sweetly designed levels, But watch out! Sometimes they may not be so sweet!

name: Crusader Kings III: Friends & Foes
description: Beware, ruler - tread carefully with those you call friend or enemy; they are two sides of the same coin. Your relationships matter more than ever, and with Crusader Kings III: Friends & Foes, witness those closest to you come alive in the most intimate detail.

name: The Jumping Lasagne
description: Join BIG L on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Kaaarot
description:
Kaaarot is a free browser-based online brawler, including an E-sport aspect.

The games are very short: 2 minutes. 4 players incarnating small animals confront each other and try to catch the Kaaarot, in order to temporarily transform into a monster that can eat the other players to score points. Once the effect of the Kaaarot has worn off, another Kaaarot appears, and off they go! Boxes appear regularly on the field: by taking a boxe, the player gets one item out of 4 randomly. Thanks to these items, he can defend himself and/or catch the Kaaarot before the others. The one who eats the most players wins.

name: Survivor.io
description:
Dangerous zombies are attacking the entire city! The city is in peril!
Awakened by the trial of dreams, you've no choice but to take on the heroic mantle of saving the city!
As a human warrior with unlimited potential, you and other survivors will have to pick up your weapons and battle these evil and dangerous zombies!

name: Zumba Blitz
description: Simple and easy to play point and shoot game. Aim carefully and clear all the marbles. Explore all levels and have fun.

name: Laser Lab
description: Laser Lab is a 3D puzzle game with the theme of exploration and interaction. The player is trapped in a locked laboratory surrounded by laser beams, and those who reroute the beams' path can escape from the chamber. It contains multiple puzzle levels, casual and challenging. Never miss it!

name: Shatterline
description: Shatterline is an arena FPS with a roguelike co-op mode (Expedition) as well as several traditional PvP modes such as TDM, Conquest, Plant-the-Bomb, and Escort. Players can choose Operatives and an armory of weapons that can be customized via attachments. Set in the near future, where humanity faces a threat of cosmic proportions. Players take on the roles of the Immunes – bearers of an extremely rare genetic combination that allows their bodies to resist the alien plague.

name: Odd Guy Meets Odd Farmers
description: Torin's mom is tired of him playing video games in his room all day. To break this bad habit, she sends him to a friend's farm to work there temporarily. Arriving at the rural community and meeting three very odd farmers, nothing but wacky adventures await him.

name: Totally Ratical Adventures
description: A 3d Platformer where you play as a CUTE RAT on a quest to save your friends! Bounce your way through 8 Colorful Worlds! Uncover a Dark Mystery...

name: I Commissioned Some Bees 0
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 10 art pieces to choose from, and 1000+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.
